# Chetan Kotak — Licensed Real Estate Agent

> Expert real estate guidance for buyers, sellers, and investors. 15+ years of experience in the Bay Area with $2B+ in closed volume and 500+ homes sold.

## About

Chetan Kotak is a licensed real estate agent specializing in the Bay Area, California. He provides data-driven strategy, fierce negotiation, and white-glove service from first showing to closing day.

## Services

- **Buyer Representation** — Helping buyers find and purchase their ideal home, including competitive multi-offer situations
- **Seller Representation** — Strategic pricing, staging, marketing, and negotiation to maximize sale price
- **Investment Properties** — Sourcing and evaluating investment opportunities across the Bay Area
- **Relocation Services** — Seamless support for buyers and sellers relocating to or from the Bay Area

## Why Choose Chetan Kotak

- 15+ years of Bay Area real estate experience
- 500+ homes sold, $2B+ in closed volume
- 98% client satisfaction rate
- Full-service support including staging, photography, lender, and contractor referrals
- Deep neighborhood expertise across the Bay Area
